# Personalized Learning Platform with Vercel AI SDK and Google Gemini

## Project Overview
Next.js application with Vercel AI SDK, Google Gemini integration, and personalized learning features.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14+ with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Vercel AI SDK
- Google Gemini AI
- React for UI components

## Features
- AI-powered chat interface
- Personalized learning paths
- Progress tracking
- Adaptive difficulty
- Topic recommendations
